page.title: 05Guilsborough Fire Station.
page.content: This is situated in Pells Close and is a modern building.The fire engine is a Bedford water tender,there are 14 retained firemen who live locally.Fire- men have to be over 18 and under 55 years of age.They are alerted to a fire call by a British Telecom Alerter.A 999 call goes to headquarters where it is put on a British Telecom printer with the address and the type of fire.The fireman reading it at the local station presses a button in the station to acknowledge the message. Summer fires are mainly in the fields,hedges and farm buildings.Winter ones are chimney fires and road accidents. Firemen also attend chemical spillages and help to free people trapped in any way.
